creator: bluemoon@xs4all.nl
text:
I use the 'fileset' of the task 'signjar'.
I would like that the signed jars be put in a different
directory (Just like javac does).

Kees.

Oh, I forgot.
Maybe the attribute can be named 'destdir' (Just like javac0
creator: bluemoon@xs4all.nl
